A lot of twists and deaths. I feel like: As a long-term Star Wars fan\, this movie really exemplifies where Disney chose to betray the audience. There's enough good material to make it worth a watch if it's free or a dollar\, but honestly it's just a waste. It does not advance the story and needlessly kills off two characters. Carrie Fisher (may she rest in peace) could have simply disappeared gracefully\, rather than having Disney tread all over her memory. Mark Hamill was pointless in passing. And... That's the movie. All of it.
